Wizard Statues can be found inside of the Hallowed Sepulchre. The player should avoid the fire that they blast out. There are indicators on the floor to show what tile the fire will come out at.

Fire blasting from a Wizard Statue

'''Wizard Statues''' can be found inside of the [[Hallowed Sepulchre]]. The player should avoid the fire that they blast out. There are indicators on the floor to show what tile the fire will come out at.

[[File:Wizard Statue Fire.png|thumb|left|100px|Fire blasting from a '''Wizard Statue''']]
